downloadTitle: MVP Session 2: Find and Navigate Key Features in Visio 2010 (working file)
downloadDescription: Learn about contextual tabs in Microsoft Visio 2010 with this diagram, part of the Visio 2010 MVP Sessions, Video 2.
detailsSection: Explore how contextual tabs in Visio 2010 work using this diagram, created as a companion to the Visio 2010 MVP Sessions (http://visio.microsoft.com/MVPSessions), Video 2. MVP Sessions Video 2 explores the user interface for Visio 2010, highlighting how common controls are organized in the Microsoft Office Backstage view and how diagram-specific commands appear dynamically in the ribbon. Use this working file to follow along with the video and see how contextual tabs, such as those associated with the included container and image, appear when relevant.
installInstructionSection: Click Download to save the working file to your computer and then open it with Visio 2010.
additionalInformationSection: Watch the Find and Navigate Key Features video (http://visio.microsoft.com/en-us/Get_Started/How_To/Pages/Find_and_navigate_key_features.aspx).
